INSERT INTO t_prod_plan_detail( prod_plan_code, ord_code, order_item_id, item_code, item_lenth, item_width, item_thick, item_num, item_total_weight, item_total_sq, item_yb_type, item_yc_type, item_status, item_cgy_code, item_variety, item_unit, item_owner, item_color, mac_code, item_price_type, item_remarks ) VALUES
( #{item.prodPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ordCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemLenth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.itemWidth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.itemThick,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.itemNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemTotalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.itemTotalSq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.itemYbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemYcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.itemCgyCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemVariety,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemUnit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.macCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemPriceType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.itemRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_prod_plan tp inner join (select prod_plan_code,ord_code,sum(item_num) num from t_prod_plan_detail group by prod_plan_code,ord_code) tc on tc.prod_plan_code = tp.prod_plan_code set tp.total_quantity = tp.total_quantity - tc.num,tp.quantity = tp.quantity - tc.num where tc.ord_code = #{ordCode}
mapper.select: SELECT t.ord_title as ordTitle, t.ord_code as ordCode, t.proxy_name as proxyName, t.create_by as ordCreateBy, t.update_by as ordUpdateBy, t.approval_by as ordApprovalBy, ts.bar_code as barCode, ts.se_code as seCode, ts.item_weight as itemWeight, ts.item_tare_weight as itemTareWeight, ts.create_by AS stockCreateBy, ts.update_by AS stockUpdateBy, ts.`status` as 'status', ts.item_cgy_code as itemCgyCode, ts.item_variety as itemVariety, ts.item_color as itemColor, ts.item_lenth as itemLenth, ts.item_width as itemWidth, ts.item_owner as itemOwner, ts.item_thick as itemThick, ts.item_yb_type as itemYbType, ts.item_yc_type itemYcType, ti.item_code as itemCode, ti.item_price as itemPrice, ti.remarks, ti.item_price_type as itemPriceType, ti.formula, tos.car_no as carNo, tos.receiver, tos.phone FROM t_stock ts INNER JOIN t_order_item ti ON ti.id = ts.order_item_id INNER JOIN t_order t ON t.ord_code = ts.ord_code left join t_out_stock_detail tsd on tsd.bar_code = ts.bar_code left join t_out_stock tos on tos.out_code = tsd.out_code WHERE ts.bar_code = #{barCode}
